description:
Dave Rubin of “The Rubin Report” reacts to a DM clip of his talk with Grant Cardone about Cardone trolling Mark Cuban on Twitter over political and economic views; and how Cuban’s stance on DEI and economic policies contradicts his capitalist image.

Check out the NEW RUBIN REPORT MERCH here:
https://daverubin.store/

#DaveRubinReacts #RubinReport #GrantCardone #grantcardone10x #business #MarkCuban #sharktank #10X #daverubin #shorts

title: The Ugly Truth About Mark Cuban | Grant Cardone
